update `CBSB` set CBSB02 = #{cbsb02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSB03 = #{cbsb03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB04 = #{cbsb04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSB05 = #{cbsb05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB06 = #{cbsb06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB07 = #{cbsb07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB08 = #{cbsb08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSB09 = #{cbsb09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB10 = #{cbsb10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB11 = #{cbsb11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB12 = #{cbsb12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB13 = #{cbsb13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSB14 = #{cbsb14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB15 = #{cbsb15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSB16 = #{cbsb16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB17 = #{cbsb17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB18 = #{cbsb18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB19 = #{cbsb19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB20 = #{cbsb20,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB21 = #{cbsb21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB22 = #{cbsb22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB23 = #{cbsb23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB24 = #{cbsb24,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB25 = #{cbsb25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB26 = #{cbsb26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB27 = #{cbsb27,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB28 = #{cbsb28,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB29 = #{cbsb29,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB30 = #{cbsb30,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSB31 = #{cbsb31,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSB32 = #{cbsb32,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBSB01 = #{cbsb01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.CBSB01, a.CBSB07,a.CBSB30,a.CBSB08,b.CBCA08,b.CBCA28,a.CBSB18,a.CBSB19,a.CBSB17, a.CBSB21,a.CBSB31,a.CBSB32,a.CBSB11 from CBSB a LEFT JOIN CBCA b on a.CBSB09=b.CBCA01 where a.cbsb06=0

SELECT a.CBSB01,a.CBSB11, a.CBSB07,a.CBSB30,a.CBSB08,b.CBCA08,b.CBCA28,a.CBSB18,a.CBSB19,c.CAUA15,d.CBWA09,e.CALA08, a.CBSB21,a.CBSB31,a.CBSB32,a.CBSB11,a.CBSB22 from CBSB a LEFT JOIN CBCA b on a.CBSB09=b.CBCA01 LEFT JOIN CAUA c on c.CAUA01=a.CBSB17 LEFT JOIN CBWA d ON d.CBWA01=a.CBSB10 LEFT JOIN CALA e ON e.CALA01=a.CBSB16
where a.cbsb06=0 and d.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%')
and b.CBCA08 like concat('%', #{cbca08}, '%') and a.CBSB01 like concat('%', #{cbsb01}, '%') and a.CBSB02 like concat('%', #{cbsb02}, '%') and a.CBSB03 like concat('%', #{cbsb03}, '%') and a.CBSB04 like concat('%', #{cbsb04}, '%') and a.CBSB05 like concat('%', #{cbsb05}, '%') and a.CBSB06 like concat('%', #{cbsb06}, '%') and a.CBSB07 like concat('%', #{cbsb07}, '%') and a.CBSB08 like concat('%', #{cbsb08}, '%') and a.CBSB09 like concat('%', #{cbsb09}, '%') and a.CBSB10 like concat('%', #{cbsb10}, '%') and a.CBSB11 like concat('%', #{cbsb11}, '%') and a.CBSB12 like concat('%', #{cbsb12}, '%') and a.CBSB13 like concat('%', #{cbsb13}, '%') and a.CBSB14 like concat('%', #{cbsb14}, '%') and a.CBSB15 like concat('%', #{cbsb15}, '%') and a.CBSB16 like concat('%', #{cbsb16}, '%') and a.CBSB17 like concat('%', #{cbsb17}, '%') and a.CBSB18 like concat('%', #{cbsb18}, '%') and a.CBSB19 like concat('%', #{cbsb19}, '%') and a.CBSB20 like concat('%', #{cbsb20}, '%') and a.CBSB21 like concat('%', #{cbsb21}, '%') and a.CBSB22 like concat('%', #{cbsb22}, '%') and a.CBSB23 like concat('%', #{cbsb23}, '%') and a.CBSB24 like concat('%', #{cbsb24}, '%') and a.CBSB25 like concat('%', #{cbsb25}, '%') and a.CBSB26 like concat('%', #{cbsb26}, '%') and a.CBSB27 like concat('%', #{cbsb27}, '%') and a.CBSB28 like concat('%', #{cbsb28}, '%') and a.CBSB29 like concat('%', #{cbsb29}, '%') and a.CBSB30 like concat('%', #{cbsb30}, '%') and a.CBSB31 like concat('%', #{cbsb31}, '%') and a.CBSB32 like concat('%', #{cbsb32}, '%') and a.cbsb08 >= #{startTime} and a.cbsb08 <=#{endTime}
and date_format(a.cbsb08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.cbsb08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.cbsb08 desc
